.. _`extractSequence`:

EXTRACTSEQUENCE
===============

Extracting Nucleotide and Amino Acid Sequences





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_analyze_orf:
        input:
            switch_list = "orf_analyzed_switch_list.RDS"
        output:
            fasta = "sequence_extracted_nt.fasta",
            aa_sequence = "sequence_extracted_AA.fasta"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/isoformSwitchAnalyzeR/extractSequence"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* extra (str): Extra parameters basides 'switchAnalyzeRlist'




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
